question:
Which among the following incidents took place during the viceroyship of Lord Irwin?
1. Indian School of Mines was established
2. Simon Commission came to Bombay
3. Meerut conspiracy case started
4. Chittagong armory raid took place
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: Indian School of Mines was established in Dhanbad in the year 1926 which was recommended by the McPherson Committee. Simon Commission came to Bombay in 1928 (3rd February). Meerut conspiracy case started in 1929 and decided in 1933. Chittagong armory raid took place (18 April).
